root.name: SpellForce: The Breath of Winter
root.description: SoundtrackThe original score for SpellForce: The Breath of Winter was composed by Tilman Sillescu and Pierre Langer and it might be worth pointing out that the soundtrack is available for free at the download section of the game's official website. Track No.Song TitleRunning Time 01 Cenwen 02.57 02 Enchanted Plains 06.54 03 Grims Betrayal 03.09 04 Mirraw Thur 01.01 05 Freeing of Fial Darg 02.13 06 The Nevershade Frontier 07.05 07 Into the Abyss 03.02 08 Claiming the Shadow Blade 03.03 09 Attack on Fastholme 01.16 10 Tirganach 01.08 11 Master of the Runes 01.08 12 Winter Deep 07.10 13 Lost in the Cold 03.00 14 Aryns Battle 02.00 15 Credits 02.31 16 The Return of Cenwen 01.56
